Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: INVITED SEMINARS: 2006: IGIER, Bocconi University. 2007: London Business School. 2008: London Business School; London School of Economics; St. Andrews University; ACLE. 2009: Bank of Italy; OxCarre, University of Oxford; IEFE and IGIER, Bocconi University; ACLE; Paris Nanterre. 2010: FEEM-IEFE joint seminar; Bonn University. 2012: Maastricht University; Paris II; TILEC, Tilburg University. 2013: EIEF. 2014: CSEF, Federico II University; IMT Lucca. 2015: University of Sheffield; Paris II; Leeds University; King's College; Pembroke College, Oxford; Exeter Business School; Norwich Business School (UEA); Newcastle University Business School; Greenwich University; University of Bologna. 2016: SEP at LUISS; University of Reading; University of Liverpool; University of Bath; University of Salerno; Blavatnik School of Government, Oxford; Coventry University; Brunel University; University of Bologna; EUI.

SUPERVISION: PhD in Economics, University of Amsterdam: Guilherme de Oliveira (graduation: 2017; placement: Columbia Law School). MPhil in Economics, Tinbergen Institute, Amsterdam: 3 students. MSc in Economics, University of Amsterdam: 22 students. MSc in Finance, University of Amsterdam: 1 student. BA in Economics, University of Amsterdam: 10 students.

NON-ACADEMIC PUBLICATIONS: 1. ``New evidence on legal institutions: The evolution toward efficiency,'' Vox (19 December, 2009); 2. ``When is regulation more efficient than competition?'' Vox (21 November, 2010); 3. ``Endogenous Legal Traditions and Economic Outcomes,'' Harvard Law School Forum on Corporate Governance (22 April, 2016); 4. ``When Are Weak Property Rights Optimal?'' Harvard Law School Forum on Corporate Governance (June 13, 2016).

REFEREEING: BE Journal of Theoretical Economics, Economic Journal, Economics of Governance, European Journal of Law and Economics, European Journal of Political Economy, International Review of Law and Economics, Journal of Comparative Economics, Journal of Economic Behavior and Organization, Journal of Development Economics, Journal of Economic Growth, Journal of Industrial Economics, Journal of Public Economics, Quarterly Journal of Political Science, Review of Law and Economics.
SEMINARS AND WORKSHOPS ORGANIZATION: ACLE ``economics seminars'' and workshops, Amsterdam.
Ph.D. EXAMINATIONS (External examiner): Francisco Gomez Martinez (Rotterdam University), 2013; Richard Bluhm (Maastricht University), 2015.

SELECTED PRESS COVERAGE: Wikipedia at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legal\_origins\_theory and\par https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Property\_rights\_(economics)\par World Bank at http://www.doingbusiness.org/researc h/legal-origin-and-institutions NEP-HIS Blog at https://nephist.wordpress.com/2016/0 6/17/medieval-history-and-its-relevance- to-modern-business/

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Co-Primary Investigator del progetto Nomography in collaborazione con il Center for Empirical Research in the Law alla Washington University School of Law e l’Amsterdam Center for Law and Economics (ACLE) all’University of Amsterdam e con l’aiuto finanziario del NSF Grant SMA 14-19967 su Coding Legal Structures, il cui principal investigator è Adam Badawi.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Co-Primary Investigator del progetto Nomography in collaborazione con il Center for Empirical Research in the Law alla Washington University School of Law e l’Amsterdam Center for Law and Economics (ACLE) all’University of Amsterdam e con l’aiuto finanziario del NSF Grant SMA 14-19967 su Coding Legal Structures, il cui principal investigator è Adam Badawi.
